column4: hi, i've ubuntu 11.04 on eeepc 1001ha, I use it with an external monitor, I want to set 1280x768 resolution, but it isn't a possibility in the configuration panel. What I can do?
I think you need a newer driver for the integrated video card, I have the 1005PE and I had a similar problem, although i can't remember exactly how I fixed it
can you paste me your xorg.conf, plz?
I just figured out to use $*
